tasks.task: Attend an event about the International Year of Pulses.
subtasks: Learn about the benefits of pulses.
Learn about the history of mutation breeding.
Understand how mutation breeding applies to pulses.

tasks.task: Appreciate the role of pulses in soil fertility.
subtasks: Learn how pulses fix atmospheric nitrogen.
Understand the impact on soil fertility.

tasks.task: Recognize the historical significance of pulses.
subtasks: Understand the timeline of pulse cultivation.
Acknowledge recent recognition of pulse value.

tasks.task: Listen to a news report about pulses.
subtasks: Identify the reporter and the organization.
Understand the context of the report.
